Helen Craig (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Craig_(actress) 0 Helen Craig (May 13, 1912 – July 20, 1986) was an American actress, perhaps best known for her role as the deaf title character in Johnny Belinda on Broadway. Helen_Craig ( May_13_,_1912 – July_20_,_1986 ) was an_American_actress , perhaps_best_known for her_role as the_deaf_title_character in Johnny_Belinda on Broadway .
